categories: Category:Battles of the Yuuzhan Vong War

nodes.text: A battle at the planet Commenor occurred during the Yuuzhan Vong War. As the Yuuzhan Vong continued to expand their control of the Core Worlds, Commenor suffered severe orbital bombardment by Yuuzhan Vong forces. This attack occurred as a similar Yuuzhan Vong attack on Kuat, which left the planet similarly damaged.
